speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mark from XYZ Debt Collection. Am I speaking with Sarah Johnson?

speaker: Customer
text: Yes, this is Sarah. What is this about?

speaker: Agent
text: I'm reaching out regarding an outstanding balance on your account. Before I proceed, can you please verify your date of birth?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you, Sarah. Can you also confirm your current address for security purposes?

speaker: Customer
text: Yes, I live at 123 Elm Street, Springfield.

speaker: Agent
text: Great, thank you for the information. You currently have a balance of $250. How would you like to settle this today?

speaker: Agent
text: Absolutely, you can pay through our secure website. Do you need assistance with the link?

speaker: Customer
text: Yes, please, that would be helpful.

speaker: Agent
text: I'll send you a link via email. Could you please confirm your email address?

speaker: Agent
text: Got it. You'll receive the link shortly. Thank you for your cooperation today.

speaker: Agent
text: You're welcome, Sarah. Have a great day!
